Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3 MORE LONDON RIVERSIDE, LONDON, SE1 2RE, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Verona Pharma PLC is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing and commercializing innovative therapeutics for the treatment of respiratory diseases with significant unmet medical needs. The company is currently focusing on developing its Ensifentrine product candidate, which will treat chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), cystic fibrosis (CF), and other respiratory diseases, including asthma.
